dependencies: yash5090/loan-calc:latest container image referenced by Kubernetes manifests (deployment.yaml, manifests/app-deploy.yaml)
Jenkins tooling dependencies implied by pipeline: awscli, kubectl, terraform, trivy, sonar-scanner, OWASP Dependency-Check, docker-scout (Jenkinsfile)
deployment_relevant_files: service.yaml (Kubernetes Service type LoadBalancer w/ AWS ALB annotations)
architectural_resources: Static web application (loan calculator) served via Nginx
Container image build/push to Docker Hub (Jenkinsfile: docker tag/push yash5090/loan-calc:latest)
Kubernetes Deployment (6 replicas) running the app (deployment.yaml, manifests/app-deploy.yaml)
Kubernetes Service type LoadBalancer exposing port 5000 (service.yaml, manifests/app-svc.yaml)
AWS Load Balancer / ALB integration inferred from Service annotations (service.yaml: service.beta.kubernetes.io/aws-load-balancer-type: "alb")
CI/CD pipeline resources: SonarQube server, Jira (jiraSendBuildInfo/jiraSendDeploymentInfo), email notifications (emailext), security scanners (Trivy, OWASP Dependency-Check), Docker Scout
(Intended) Terraform-managed infrastructure for EKS is implied by directory name and Jenkinsfile calling terraform, but no .tf files are present in this repository snapshot
